product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 15 Sleeping Bag - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 15 Sleeping Bag uses SkyLoft continuous-filament, hollow-fiber insulation that's highly compressible, lofty and light for comfort on 3-season backpacking trips. Overlapping shingle construction helps eliminate cold spots to keep you warm at night. Rated to keep you warm down to about 15degF for use in spring, summer and fall when temperatures dip into the teens. Full-length zipper. Nylon ripstop exterior is lined with soft polyester. The ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 15 Sleeping Bag comes with a compression stuff sack. Special buy.
short_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 15 Sleeping Bag uses SkyLoft continuous-filament, hollow-fiber insulation that's highly compressible, lofty and light for comfort on 3-season backpacking trips.
